content.raw:
Thanks for the contribution! This works great for me with `actor.world` and `animated_box.world`.

For `cafe.world` however, when the world is reset, both actors become overlapped. This is probably because `ActorPlugin` also needs a reset. You're welcome to tackle this on this pull request, but otherwise we can ticket an issue for the plugin.
content.html:
Thanks for the contribution! This works great for me with actor.world and animated_box.world.

For cafe.world however, when the world is reset, both actors become overlapped. This is probably because ActorPlugin also needs a reset. You're welcome to tackle this on this pull request, but otherwise we can ticket an issue for the plugin.
